review: Work well for Netflix. We could not figure out how to get it to work on Amazon movies, so we ended up ordering the Amazon Fire Stick.
author: RBJ

review: This product works like a charm!  Excellent quality and easy set up.  I use it to watch youtube videos, on a "non-smart" flat screen.  Video quality is a good as any streaming source on our smart TV's.  Highly recommend.
author: David "David"

review: Chromecast and the Popcorn Time app make for a fantastic home theater.  No more messing with torrents, downloads, and file conversions.  It all just works.  Highly recommended
author: Brett Schulte
